title: I can no longer Bookmark All Open Tabs. When I try, I get an Edit Bookmark box for Tags and Keywords, instead.
content: When I select Select All Tabs and then Bookmark Tabs I get a large Edit Bookmarks box asking me for Tags and Keywords. I no longer get the New Bookmark box asking to name a folder. I have tried everything I only get this. I can no longer Bookmark All Open Tabs. This started with the latest update to 110.0. Please help!!
creator: kenmendell

title: Gaining more control of my PC. Trying to make my PC basically run on your products and leave MSN out of as many places that I can on my PC.
content: It seems every time I allow windows update it changes the way I access things and makes changes in areas I don't want changes made or adds things I don't need. On this question, I would like to know how to access my pictures and then print them. On one of the latest updates from MSN when I go to look at a saved picture I can only see them in MSN "Paint". I just want to simply view my pictures and not change them. I want to then print them in the fastest and most uncomplicated way that I can. I'm currently dealing with a way just to see the pictures that I've saved using Firefox and DuckDuckgo search. At one time when Internet Explorer was being used, I just saved a picture and then accessed the folder in which I placed them, and then just simply printed them. Please advise me on how I can use your products to get back to the simplest way possible. I also use Onedrive and I'm going to delete it. It just is something I find gets in the way. I like simple no hassle products to replace the way MSN wants me to do things. I tried in the past to eliminate it and then I couldn't find some saved items in the documents, download, and picture storage area. Turns out they were placed in the recycle bin. I have no idea why they just could stay in the files I placed them in rather than send them to recycle. I know this is long and I'm sorry for that. I hope what I've written in this question makes sense. I have another question but I'll save it for another email to the staff. Thank you very much for any help or advise you can provide. I do value your time and help. Sincerely, Robert Auerbach
creator: colleenandrob

title: For Password Security
content:
The problem of Mozilla Firefox that when I want to see my save password, I easily see this. And this is the big problem for me. Because when another person want to see my save passwords he can also easily see it. In that case I can lost my password and could be hacking my important accounts and sites.

If you see another software like Google chrome or Opera mini, when I want to see my save password then the softwares offer to put me the windows password or pin to see the password. This is very secure to protect my save password.

Why Mozilla Firefox software's not found the option? For this reason I can't use the Mozilla Firefox.

I need to save many important Password. But I can't do it in Mozilla Firefox for security reason. Once a time someone hacked my password in [save password] option to see the password easily in Mozilla Firefox. Please Fix the problem.
creator: medulsiddike01

title: website error
content:
Hi, I receive every week a newsletter, where are listed special offers more info, etc. Firefox always blocks this page and redirect it to 404 page of this website. However, when I copy the same link from the newsletter and load it to Chrome, there is no problem. Here is the example: 'Actual Link: 'https://www.newsletter.reallusion.com/click.html?x=a62e&lc=K7G&mc=b&s=wm4&u=v&z=SOOKj4J& Result in Firefox: https://www.newsletter.reallusion.com/error404.html This is very annoying and makes me to want to switch to Chrome as a default browser unless there is an option in Firefox how to fix it.

Please let me know

animall14
creator: animall14

title: Ancestry missing DNA matches
content: Ever since last Firefox update have been unable to access my DNA matches in my Ancestry program. Are you working on fixing whatever it is that you did to cause this? Heather
creator: sparrowpilot
